metadata.title: CVE-2015-7577 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: activerecord/lib/active_record/nested_attributes.rb in Active Record inRuby on Rails 3.1.x and 3.2.x before 3.2.22.1, 4.0.x and 4.1.x before4.1.14.1, 4.2.x before 4.2.5.1, and 5.x before 5.0.0.beta1.1 does notproperly implement a certain destroy option, which allows remote attackersto bypass intended change restrictions by leveraging use of the nestedattributes feature.

criterions.comment: ruby-rails-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-activerecord-3.2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
rails-4.0: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
